# swagger-java-client

Smart house service

- API version: 1.0.0
  - Build date: 2024-05-19T19:53:03.153666+03:00[Europe/Moscow]

No description provided (generated by Swagger Codegen https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-codegen)

*Automatically generated by the [Swagger Codegen](https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-codegen)*

## Requirements

Building the API client library requires:

1. Java 1.7+
2. Maven/Gradle

## Installation

To install the API client library to your local Maven repository, simply execute:

```shell
mvn clean install
```

To deploy it to a remote Maven repository instead, configure the settings of the repository and execute:

```shell
mvn clean deploy
```

Refer to the [OSSRH Guide](http://central.sonatype.org/pages/ossrh-guide.html) for more information.

### Maven users

Add this dependency to your project's POM:

```xml

<dependency>
  <groupId>io.swagger</groupId>
  <artifactId>swagger-java-client</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.0</version>
  <scope>compile</scope>
</dependency>
```

### Gradle users

Add this dependency to your project's build file:

```groovy
compile "io.swagger:swagger-java-client:1.0.0"
```

### Others

At first generate the JAR by executing:

```shell
mvn clean package
```

Then manually install the following JARs:

* `target/swagger-java-client-1.0.0.jar`
* `target/lib/*.jar`

## Getting Started

Please follow the [installation](#installation) instruction and execute the following Java code:

```java
import io.swagger.client.*;
import io.swagger.client.auth.*;
import io.swagger.client.model.*;
import io.swagger.client.api.SmartHouseApi;

import java.io.File;
import java.util.*;

public class SmartHouseApiExample {

  public static void main(String[] args) {

    SmartHouseApi apiInstance = new SmartHouseApi();
    CreateHouseRequest body = new CreateHouseRequest(); // CreateHouseRequest | 
    try {
      CreateHouseResponse result = apiInstance.createHouse(body);
      System.out.println(result);
    } catch (ApiException e) {
      System.err.println("Exception when calling SmartHouseApi#createHouse");
      e.printStackTrace();
    }
  }
}
import io.swagger.client.*;
        import io.swagger.client.auth.*;
        import io.swagger.client.model.*;
        import io.swagger.client.api.SmartHouseApi;

        import java.io.File;
        import java.util.*;

public class SmartHouseApiExample {

  public static void main(String[] args) {

    SmartHouseApi apiInstance = new SmartHouseApi();
    CreateUserRequest body = new CreateUserRequest(); // CreateUserRequest | 
    try {
      UserCreateResponse result = apiInstance.createUser(body);
      System.out.println(result);
    } catch (ApiException e) {
      System.err.println("Exception when calling SmartHouseApi#createUser");
      e.printStackTrace();
    }
  }
}
import io.swagger.client.*;
        import io.swagger.client.auth.*;
        import io.swagger.client.model.*;
        import io.swagger.client.api.SmartHouseApi;

        import java.io.File;
        import java.util.*;

public class SmartHouseApiExample {

  public static void main(String[] args) {

    SmartHouseApi apiInstance = new SmartHouseApi();
    BigDecimal houseId = new BigDecimal(); // BigDecimal | 
    try {
      apiInstance.deleteHouse(houseId);
    } catch (ApiException e) {
      System.err.println("Exception when calling SmartHouseApi#deleteHouse");
      e.printStackTrace();
    }
  }
}
import io.swagger.client.*;
        import io.swagger.client.auth.*;
        import io.swagger.client.model.*;
        import io.swagger.client.api.SmartHouseApi;

        import java.io.File;
        import java.util.*;

public class SmartHouseApiExample {

  public static void main(String[] args) {

    SmartHouseApi apiInstance = new SmartHouseApi();
    try {
      Devices result = apiInstance.getAllowedDevices();
      System.out.println(result);
    } catch (ApiException e) {
      System.err.println("Exception when calling SmartHouseApi#getAllowedDevices");
      e.printStackTrace();
    }
  }
}
```

## Documentation for API Endpoints

All URIs are relative to *http://localhost:6678/smart-house*

 Class           | Method                                                           | HTTP request          | Description 
-----------------|------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------|-------------
 *SmartHouseApi* | [**createHouse**](docs/SmartHouseApi.md#createHouse)             | **POST** /house       |
 *SmartHouseApi* | [**createUser**](docs/SmartHouseApi.md#createUser)               | **POST** /user/create |
 *SmartHouseApi* | [**deleteHouse**](docs/SmartHouseApi.md#deleteHouse)             | **DELETE** /house     |
 *SmartHouseApi* | [**getAllowedDevices**](docs/SmartHouseApi.md#getAllowedDevices) | **GET** /devices      |

All endpoints do not require authorization.
Authentication schemes defined for the API:

## Recommendation

It's recommended to create an instance of `ApiClient` per thread in a multithreaded environment to avoid any potential
issues.
